name: amar'sHome
0:
”Alexa, open smart light control”
”Alexa, launch smart light control”
”Alexa, ask smart light control”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart light control
des: smart light control is an intuitive Alexa skill designed to effortlessly control your home lighting with simple voice commands. Specifically tailored for turning lights on and off, this skill integrates seamlessly with your smart lighting system, providing you with hands-free convenience and efficient control. Perfect for simplifying daily routines, Light Maestro enhances the user experience by making it easy to manage your lighting environment, whether you need to illuminate a room or create a cozy, dimmed setting. Ideal for smart home enthusiasts and those seeking convenience, Light Maestro transforms basic lighting control into a smooth, hassle-free process.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
